title: Embed interactive components in 11 theory.tsx files (T14)
description: The 10 interactive components (TruthValueAnimator, ArgumentTree, VennDiagram, ExampleMapping, InlineMiniQuiz, LogicSandbox) have been built and tested, but were never embedded into the theory.tsx content pages. This was T14 in the implementation plan. All 11 chapters need interactive components added inline with the theory content. See docs/plans/2026-02-06-interactive-logic-features.md lines 2110-2196 for the mapping of which components go in which chapters.
